name: Bullet-Looper
description:
The Z, X and the Arrow Keys are all you need in this game.

Bullet-Looper (working title) is a new, more polished version of the game I made for JimJam#2 ("Ouros Incorporated"). I worked on improving the artwork, re-wrote a lot of the code to make things more robust, and made some changes after the feedback I received, such as adding an option to restart the room you are in, as well as a few other things:

- Added Sokoban style cubes

- Added some more SFX

- Fixed a bug where you could shoot bullets during the end screen

Got any ideas for puzzles? I'd love to hear them!
